description: This file contains utility string functions within the Utils::String namespace, including case-insensitive comparison, substring search, trimming spaces, encoding, and whitespace removal.

classes.name: loc_equal
classes.description: A template struct for locale-aware character comparison, primarily used for case-insensitive comparisons.

methods.name: int find_substr_ci(const T & string,const T & substring,const std::locale & loc=std::locale ())
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive search for a substring within a string, returning the position or -1 if not found.

methods.name: bool contains(const T & string,const T & substring,const std::locale & loc=std::locale ())
methods.description: Checks if a substring is present within a string, case-insensitive.

methods.name: bool equal(const T & string,const T & string2,const std::locale & loc=std::locale ())
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive comparison between two strings.

methods.name: void ltrim(std::string & s)
methods.description: Removes leading whitespace characters from a string.

methods.name: void rtrim(std::string & s)
methods.description: Removes trailing whitespace characters from a string.

methods.name: void trim(std::string & s)
methods.description: Removes whitespace from both ends of a string.

methods.name: void toUpper(std::string & s)
methods.description: Converts a string to uppercase.

methods.name: void toLower(std::string & s)
methods.description: Converts a string to lowercase.

methods.name: bool stringContains(const std::string & s1,const char * s2)
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive check if one string contains another.

methods.name: void split(std::vector<std::string> & stringList,std::string & s,std::string delimiters)
methods.description: Splits a string into a vector of substrings based on delimiter characters.

methods.name: void imageEncoder(const uint8_t object[],const uint32_t length,const bool padding,string & result)
methods.description: Encodes a byte array into a Base64 string, with optional padding.

methods.name: bool removeExtraWhitespaces(string & in_str,string & out_str)
methods.description: Removes extra spaces within a string, consolidating multiple spaces into a single space.
